entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nothing is suggested after entering comparison operators in `is` pattern matching #58890
  • Unnecessary cast false positive in expression trees #58887
  • char constant in Linq Queryable expression is converted to int #58886

PullRequests

Created

  • Formatting options refactoring - step 2 #58891
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Syntax tree configuration #58889
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Revert "Update System.Text.Json to 6.0.0 (#58365)"" #58888
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to features/required-members #58883
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #58885
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #58884
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #58882
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add Stack Trace Explorer to our searchable options #58869
    Area-IDE
  • Add CompilerGeneratedAttribute to record members #58542
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Records
  • [semi-auto-props]: Refactor and rename 'AccessingAutoPropertyFromConstructor' #58832
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support multi-caret when inserting doc comments #54741
    Area-IDE
  • Set IDE0008 severity #52951
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Unskip TestSupportedDiagnosticsMessageHelpLinkUri #51882
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove unneeded IVTs in Interactive layer #51476
    Area-Interactive
  • Remove unneeded ProjectReferences in CodeStyle layer #51473
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove unneeded project references in EditorFeatures layer #51471
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Extend TypeDeclarationStructureTests with records #48161
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Filter cancellation exceptions in generator driver #58843
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.2
  • Restore feature to tell people when a lambda is unnecessary. #58875
    Area-IDE
  • Create solution on the main thread in integration tests #58873
    Area-Infrastructure
